explanation: [0-0] On a beach, a little boy in a blue shirt is crying. A young woman in a black dress is squatting to his right. Her hands are spread out on both sides of her face, her eyes wide open, staring straight ahead, her brows furrowed, and her mouth pouting. In the distance is a large beach and a colorful ship, with a green toy in the lower left corner.

[0-2] Then the woman in the black dress waves her hands, and the little boy next to her puts his hands over his eyes. Then the woman jumps to the left while squatting, getting closer to the little boy. Then she puts her hands on the boy's shoulders, and the boy smiles happily. At the same time, the toy crocodile in the lower left corner opens and closes its mouth. Then the little boy hides in the woman's arms, and a left hand holding the green crocodile toy appears on the left side.

[0-2] Then the woman in the black dress waves her hands, and the little boy next to her puts his hands over his eyes. Then the woman jumps to the left while squatting, getting closer to the little boy. Then she puts her hands on the boy's shoulders, and the boy smiles happily. At the same time, the toy crocodile in the lower left corner opens and closes its mouth. Then the little boy hides in the woman's arms, and a left hand holding the green crocodile toy appears on the left side.

[2-8] Then a young man in a red shirt comes out from the left side, holding a green crocodile toy. He bends down, knees slightly bent, holding the toy in his left hand, looking at the woman in the black dress opposite him. The little boy beside him turns to his right and looks at the man in the red shirt. Then the woman in the black dress stands up and slaps the man in the red shirt hard with both hands. The man then crouches down and prepares to hand the green crocodile toy to the little boy.

[8-15] Then the woman in the black dress reaches out and takes the green toy, and then throws it on the sand in front of her. The man looks at the woman's action in surprise. Then the man leans forward to pick up the toy. At the same time, the woman in the black dress next to him also takes a step forward and raises her left foot. Then the man picks up the toy and puts it in front of the little boy. The little boy looks at the toy in front of him. Then the woman in the black dress next to him reaches out her right hand and slaps the man on the head, looking at the man's action with dissatisfaction. The man stands up slightly and looks at the woman opposite him with a smile.
